head.title: Phelps School District | Home of the Fighting Knights | Phelps, WI 54554

div.h2: Class of 2020, School Closure, Daycare Info and Me...

div.div:
Class of 2020, School Closure, Daycare Info and Meal Distribution
Per Governor Evers order, schools are closed through rest of 2019/2020 school year. See plans moving forward for our 2020 Graduates in the "News" section. Lunch and Breakfast are available, free of charge, please see the "News" section of the website for more information about these deliveries. The daycare will remain open during the school closure. The Pandemic Plan and new policies and procedures are listed in the "News" section of the website and in effect as of 3/19/20.
